message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for a limited time at the special price of $120. I believe it will be very valuable for you. What do you think?
I'm really interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $60. I'm willing to pay $60 for it.
Hi Bob, thanks for your interest! I understand your budget, but $60 is quite low for the value this product offers. Could you do $100?
I'm still interested in the product, but I really think $70 is a fair price. I'm willing to pay $70 for it.
Bob, I appreciate you working with me on this. How about we split the difference and agree on $85? This is my final offer.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still not willing to go above $70. I'm willing to meet you in the middle, so I'll offer $72.50
